comment.summary: Makes an element resizable by dragging its edges.

examples.name: Kitchen Sink
examples.content:
```svelte
<div use:resize={{
	sides: ['left', 'bottom'],
	gutterSize: 3,
	onResize: () => console.log('resized'),
	persistent: false,
	visible: false,
	color: 'var(--fg-d)',
	borderRadius: '0.5rem',
}} />
```
